description: Light, comfy fleece sweater for all kinds of outdoor fun. Easy to layer under a shell jacket on cool summer evenings or a spring hike. The design is timeless with a half-length zipper at the front and a large kangaroo pocket with zippered side openings. Made from a light, pliant fleece fabric in recycled polyester with a drawcord adjustment at the hem.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Lite Fleece - Mens
